question: Which city will host 15th Mumbai International Film Festival for Documentary, Short and Animation films?
explanation: Mumbai is to host the 15th Mumbai International Film Festival (MIFF) for Documentary, Short and Animation films from 28th January - 3rd February 2018. The Organizing Committee of MIFF is headed by the Secretary, I&B and consists of eminent film personalities, documentary makers and film critics. It is organized by theFilms Division, Ministry of Information & Broadcasting (I&B).
